Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, east of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: You can make out the western City Walls just past Rosecrest Street, to the west. Rosecrest Street runs parallel to the city wall and evenutally ends up at the Southwestern Observational Station. To the south of Hillcrest Drive is the Ministry of Knowledge, which is a large library of sorts where information may be found on just about anything or anybody that ever existed in Oceancrest.
